  <LineChart
    :data="data"
    index="year"
    :categories="['Export Growth Rate', 'Import Growth Rate']"
    :y-formatter="(tick, i) => {
      return typeof tick === 'number'
        ? `$ ${new Intl.NumberFormat('us').format(tick).toString()}`
        : ''
    }"
    :custom-tooltip="CustomChartTooltip"
  />
</template>
